Code.Name: Rejected
Code.Description: Response code is used when the receiver will not process the referenced message any further. The reason for rejecting the message shall be stated in ´Status Reason´.

Code.Name: Accepted
Code.Description: Response code is uses when the referenced message has been accepted by the receiver.

Code.Name: Conditionally accepted
Code.Description: Response code is used when the receiver is accepting the message under conditions stated in ‘Status Reason’ and proceed to continue the process unless disputed by the sender.

Code.Name: Published
Code.Description: Indication that the notice has been published at a certain time.
